directions: In a blender, combine oil, tomato soup, brown sugar,  wine or white vinegar, dry mustard, garlic salt, onion salt, celery salt, Worcestershire sauce, paprika, hot sauce, and mayonnaise. Cover, and blend on low speed.  Increase speed, and blend until thoroughly mixed.  Refrigerate, covered, until ready to use.
title: Kitchen Sink Salad Dressing
